<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/52ea92b19d2bc992dd4570add64c12d98eab9db2|patch 8.2.0476: terminal nasty callback test fails sometimes>
patch 8.2.0476: terminal nasty callback test fails sometimes

Problem:    Terminal nasty callback test fails sometimes.
Solution:   use term_wait() instead of a sleep. (Yee Cheng Chin,closes #5865)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0476: terminal nasty callback test fails sometimes · vim/vim@52ea92b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0476: terminal nasty callback test fails sometimes · vim/vim@52ea92b
attachments.text: Problem: Terminal nasty callback test fails sometimes. Solution: use term_wait() instead of a sleep. (Yee Cheng Chin,closes #5865)

patch 8.2.0478: new buffers are not added to the Buffers menu

Problem:    New buffers are not added to the Buffers menu.
Solution:   Turn number into string. (Yee Cheng Chin, closes #5864)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0478: new buffers are not added to the Buffers menu · vim/vim@5908fdf
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0478: new buffers are not added to the Buffers menu · vim/vim@5908fdf
attachments.text: Problem: New buffers are not added to the Buffers menu. Solution: Turn number into string. (Yee Cheng Chin, closes #5864)

patch 8.2.0479: unloading shared libraries on exit has no purpose

Problem:    Unloading shared libraries on exit has no purpose.
Solution:   Do not unload shared libraries on exit.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0479: unloading shared libraries on exit has no purpose · vim/vim@2027973
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0479: unloading shared libraries on exit has no purpose · vim/vim@2027973
attachments.text: Problem: Unloading shared libraries on exit has no purpose. Solution: Do not unload shared libraries on exit.
